title: Scrub Field
description: A grassy meadow punctuated by shrub and scrub. Lush, green grasses wave gently in the wind. Small shrubs and stunted trees poke out of the grasses sporadically. The grasses range in height from less than a meter to nearly two meters tall in places. The land is flat to the north, gently sloped down to the east, gently sloped up to the south, gently sloped down to the west.
